Body:
status = api.status_post('Toot!', visibility=visibility, spoiler_text=
    spoiler_text)
try:
    assert status
    if visibility:
        assert status['visibility'] == visibility
    if spoiler_text:
        assert status['spoiler_text'] == spoiler_text
finally:
    api.status_delete(status['id'])
pytest.mark.vcr()pytest.mark.parametrize('visibility', (None, 'direct', 'private',
    'unlisted', 'public', pytest.param('foobar', marks=pytest.mark.xfail(
    strict=True))))pytest.mark.parametrize('spoiler_text', (None, 'Content warning'))
